recipe_name: Watermelon and Feta Salad with Arugula and Spinach
ingredients: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 2 teaspoons white balsamic vinegar,   +   1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 2 cups arugula, 2 cups baby spinach leaves, 1 cup thinly sliced red onion, 1 cup grape tomatoes, halved,   +   1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 cups bite sized watermelon chunks
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 470mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 12g 4%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 21mg 106%, Calcium 138mg 11%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 346mg 7%
